#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;

    cin >> t;

    while(t--) {
        int n, x, y, z;
        int flag = 0;
        cin >> n;
        cin >> x >> y >> z;
        int num = x*100+y*10+z;
        for(int i = 9; i > 0; i--) {
            for(int j = 9; j >= 0; j--) {
                int val = i*10000+num*10+j;
                //cout << val;
                if(val % n == 0) {
                    //cout << val << endl;
                    cout << i << " " << j << " " << val/n << endl;
                    flag = 1;
                }
                if(flag) break;
            }
            if(flag) break;
        }

        if(!flag) cout << 0 << endl;
    }
}
